individual_metadata.synopsis: Dialog with mizora at Wyrm's Rock near the entrance to Lower city. You see Ravengard taken away, and Mizora tells you to meet him in camp. Version if Wyll is not there.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Dialog with mizora at Wyrm's Rock near the entrance to Lower city. She is in human form. Wyll sees his father taken away, and Mizora tells him to meet him in camp.

1.speaker: Mizora
1.text: Go on up, pay Gortash a visit. A fete to remember, I guarantee.

36.speaker: Mizora
36.text: What did I tell you? A momentous occasion, I'm sure you agree.

7.speaker: Mizora
7.text: And to think the drama's just started.

37.speaker: Mizora
37.text: Poor little Wyll. Such a tragedy - his own father, cut down in his prime. Damn shame, if you ask me.

41.speaker: Mizora
41.text: A man of the people, the grandest of dukes. Hard to think he's forever lost to us.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I don't understand. The blow should have only knocked him out, not killed him.

43.speaker: Narrator
43.text: *Mizora responds with knowing silence - and a wide smile.*

19.speaker: Mizora
19.text: I'm saying that someone stepping off stage doesn't have to mean the end of their story.

34.speaker: Mizora
34.text: Meet me in your camp. I've got a devil of a proposal.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: Are you saying Ravengard's not gone for good?

20.speaker: Player
20.text: Damn right he is. And he better stay that way.

39.speaker: Mizora
39.text: You say that. But minds can change in the span of a snap.
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora snaps her fingers with the word 'snap'.

38.speaker: Mizora
38.text: If it isn't little Wyll's chums. I hope he hasn't been too much trouble.

2.speaker: Mizora
2.text: Poor thing. He's had a tough go - and you don't know the half of it.

12.speaker: Mizora
12.text: You see, Gortash has had Wyll's father... relocated.

28.speaker: Mizora
28.text: To his death, the way I hear it.

8.speaker: Mizora
8.text: Such a shame. And to think there's no way to save him.
8.context: NodeContext: Very cheekily. She know she holds all the cards

40.speaker: Player
40.text: That was fast. I thought Gortash would have more use for the duke in Wyrm's Rock.

21.speaker: Mizora
21.text: I'm just an impartial observer - this is Gortash's game. A murderous one, the way I hear it.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: Relocated? What are you playing at, devil?

11.speaker: Mizora
11.text: Rude. This is Gortash's game. I'm just an impartial observer.

3.speaker: Mizora
3.text: Ravengard's good as dead. And to think, there's no way to save him.

13.speaker: Mizora
13.text: I know enough. Let's talk to Wyll in your camp, work something out.

31.speaker: Mizora
31.text: The Duke's life depends on it.

33.speaker: Player
33.text: I'm not giving up on the duke. Tell me what to do.

18.speaker: Mizora
18.text: Let's meet Wyll in your camp, work something out.

17.speaker: Player
17.text: Who knows? Let him die for all I care.

30.speaker: Mizora
30.text: You may not care - but Wyll does.

5.speaker: Mizora
5.text: Let's meet in your camp, lay everything out.

16.speaker: Mizora
16.text: The Duke's life is not all that's at stake.

23.context: CinematicNodeContext: A diabolical circle draws underneath Mizora. She descends into it and it closes behind her.

27.speaker: Mizora
27.text: Heard about his father. The Dead Three's puppet - a travesty, really.

14.speaker: Mizora
14.text: He's upstairs in Wyrm's Rock, ordaining Gortash as Archduke.

35.speaker: Mizora
35.text: A splendid shindig, I hear - perfect for crashing. Go on up - we'll talk after. And bring the pup along if you can.

25.speaker: Mizora
25.text: I'd hate for him to miss the fun.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_88.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_88.text: Shit - I don't understand it. The blow should have knocked him out, not killed him.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_43.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_43.text: *Mizora responds with knowing silence - and a wide smile.*

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_18.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_18.text: No, no - this was your doing, wasn't it?

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_56.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_56.text: You wound me, pup. I admired your father - he was a man of the people, the grandest of dukes.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_94.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_94.text: Hard to think he's forever lost to us.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_1.text: What did I tell you? A momentous occasion, I'm sure you agree.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_22.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_22.text: I've had enough, Mizora. What do you want?

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_111.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_111.text: Your attention, little pup, nothing more. And you'll be glad to give it.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_30.text: Go on up, pay Gortash a visit. A fete to remember, I guarantee.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_21.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_21.text: Mizora - I've had enough. You owe your life to me. Time to end the pact.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_27.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_27.text: Bloody hells. Where are they taking him?

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_92.speaker: Mizora
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_92.text: Feeling cheeky, are we? Most unbecoming.

OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_62.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_AOM_OOM_62.text: Mizora - I've had enough. You promised my freedom. Time to end the pact.
